Class GameStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • game.GameStatus

extends java.util.Observable
    A Model class to represent the status of the game

    Alireza

      • updateGameStatusWithAutobotLoser

        public void updateGameStatusWithAutobotLoser(TransformerFactory.Autobot autobot)
        The method updates game status based on an autobot is a loser. It will set the corresponding autobot in the team as eliminated
        Parameters:
        autobot -

      • updateGameStatusWithDeceptionLoser

      • updateGameTerminationStatus

        public void updateGameTerminationStatus()
        Checks whether the game should be terminated and update the isGoingOn property Situation 1: If SpecialRule2 happens. In this case all competitors will eliminate Situation 2: If all battles end

      • expectedNumberOfBattles

      • getWinnerTeam

        public Constant.WinnerTeam getWinnerTeam()

        the winner team enum
